problem_text_cn: 如图,以O为圆心的两个同心圆中,大圆的弦AB是小圆的切线．若大圆半径为10cm,小圆半径为6cm,则弦AB的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, among the two concentric circles with O as the center, the chord AB of the great circle is the tangent of the small circle. If the radius of the great circle is N_0 and the radius of the small circle is N_1, the length of the chord AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:作OC⊥AB于C,连结OA,如图,∵大圆的弦AB是小圆的切线,∴OC=6,在Rt△AOC中,AC=√{OA^{2}-OC^{2}}=√{10^{2}-6^{2}}=8,∵OC⊥AB,∴AC=BC,∴AB=2AC=16(cm)．故选:D．
